commands.speaker: Rin
commands.line: Oh my gosh, that was so much fun!

commands.speaker: Hanayo
commands.line: Yeah, I had a great time!

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: My throat hurts from cheering them on so hard.

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: I don't think I've ever heard you be that loud outside of your own shows.

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: Rina-chan Board says, "Blush."

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: That's nothing to be embarrassed over! Anyone would have with a performance that spectacular!

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: Uh-huh! Shizuko was screaming at the top of her lungs too!

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: I mean...I wouldn't call that screaming. Yelling, maybe...

commands.speaker: Nico
commands.line: See? Pretty fun to watch a live show instead of just performing all the time, huh?

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: Yeah! I even saw some parts we might be able to incorporate into our own performances. *Giggle* I'm gonna be cuter than ever!

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: I suppose it goes without saying, but everyone has their own individual ways of expressing themselves. This was a truly valuable learning experience.

commands.speaker: Nico
commands.line: You know what they say, do what you love and success will follow. School idols who love school idols have the potential to reach the top!

commands.speaker: Rin
commands.line: I just can't sit still after watching that amazing show!

commands.speaker: Hanayo
commands.line: I know, right?! I wanna perform now, too!

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: I can't wait to use what I learned today at my next performance!

commands.speaker: Nico
commands.line: Now you're gettin' it... Whoa, look at the time!

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: What's wrong?

commands.speaker: Nico
commands.line: I've got stuff to do, is all. That's it for today.

commands.speaker: Rin
commands.line: Okay! Let's go home, Kayo-chin.

commands.speaker: Hanayo
commands.line: All right! See ya, everyone.

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: Bye-bye.

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: Should we get going too?

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: Wait a second.

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: Forget something?

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: No, but don't you wanna know what Nico's other plans are?

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: AGAIN?!

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: This is Nico we're talking about, so I bet she's secretly going off to scout out some other place.

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: It's possible.

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: I probably don't need to ask, but I'm going to anyway. What are you planning to do?

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: We're gonna tail her for a little bit longer!

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: I knew it!

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: Come on, let's go.

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: Yeah!

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: Do we have to?!

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: Is this a children's center?

commands.speaker: Nico
commands.line: Hang on... Why were you guys following me?!

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: Eek! The jig is up! W-Well, uhh... We figured you might be scouting some other place out. Is this where the next live show is?

commands.speaker: Nico
commands.line: What? No. I'm here to pick up my little siblings.

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: Oh, what? That's it? You're a better big sister than I expected.

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: Is it just me, or are there a lot of middle and high school students around?

commands.speaker: Nico
commands.line: Oh, that? Yeah, it's an event where middle and high school students volunteer to play with the local kids. They do it here every week.

commands.speaker: Shioriko
commands.line: Hm? What are you all doing here?

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: Sh-Shioriko Mifune!

commands.speaker: Shioriko
commands.line: I don't really appreciate you screaming my full name right in my face.

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: S-Sorry.

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: Are you volunteering here?

commands.speaker: Shioriko
commands.line: Yes. Is that why you're here too? The event is almost over, but...

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: Well, uh... Ahaha...

commands.speaker: Shioriko
commands.line: Since you're here, you should at least play some games with the children.

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: She seems so different when she's here.

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: Yeah, she's so much more loose and relaxed here compared to when we see her at school.

commands.speaker: Child
commands.line: Oh, it's Nico! Let's play! Let's play!

commands.speaker: Nico
commands.line: Can't say no to that! Sure, let's play!

commands.speaker: Child
commands.line: Sing us a 's song!

commands.speaker: Nico
commands.line: Well, since you asked so nicely! Just this once, okay?

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: Wow, even the children know about her and her group. 's is really on another level.

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: Ugh! I can't stand losing out to her! We need to work even harder!

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: Guess that's what you call a popularity gap. Rina-chan Board says, "Sad-face."

commands.speaker: Shioriko
commands.line: This 's must be quite the amazing group. The children look like they are having so much fun.

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: Well, Nico is a member of that amazing group! Of COURSE she's popular!

commands.speaker: Shioriko
commands.line: What a terrible waste of potential. I'm sure she must have plenty of other talents, but she went and decided to become a school idol.

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: Um... Why are you so hostile towards school idols? Do you hate us?

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: Straight and to the point.

commands.speaker: Shioriko
commands.line: Don't be ridiculous. I'm not being actively hostile toward you. I just believe your activities are academically irrelevant.

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: Irrelevant? School idol activities are important experiences that you can only have while you're in school!

commands.speaker: Shioriko
commands.line: I have no intention of discussing this here, nor do I intend on listening to your thoughts on this matter any further.

commands.speaker: Shioriko
commands.line: Now then, go on and enjoy your time with the children until the event is over. I will excuse myself here.

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: She really DOES get up in arms any time you bring up school idols.

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: With how stubborn she is about it, I really wonder if something must have happened to her in the past.
